subject: New cookie consent layout option, 15pack special, and more
preview: Fellow agency partners,  We just released a new cookie consent layout option for you and your clients' websites! This new layout sits in the bottom left corner of the screen and provides more visibili

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Fellow agency partners,

We just released a new cookie consent layout option for you and your clients' websites! This new layout sits in the bottom left corner of the screen and provides more visibility to the actual website itself. Although smaller, this new layout still provides the required features for respective applicable laws.

Below are some visuals showing display options for this new design. Also, if you'd like to see a live version, check out termageddon.com in an incognito window.

New GDPR & UK DPA Layout Options

Layout #1: Small*
Displays categories and exit 'x' button

* this is the recommended layout for max GDPR & UK DPA compliance

Layout #2: Extra-Small**
Hides categories and includes exit 'x' button.

** although displaying categories is considered best practice, this even more condensed option is available if clients demand it!

New CPRA / VCDPA Layout Options

Layout #3: If you sell data
Standard opt out mechanism is displayed.

Layout #4: If you do not sell data
Standard/default message is displayed.

We hope you like this new layout and thank you for the feedback!

When we started Termageddon, we did not anticipate just how much support we would get from our agency partners. It's simply been incredible. We have YOU to thank for helping us grow, and sharing little feedback like this where clients want a smaller option is greatly appreciated. Thank you all!

Below you will find additional news/updates (plus a bonus 15pack deal!) and an FAQ are for this new consent layout option. If you have any questions, please reply to this email!

- Team Termageddon
In other news:

SPECIAL 15pack OFFER: [+$1,800/year more recurring revenue]
In lieu of our pricing change (see previous email or click here for more info), between now and July 1, 2023, we are releasing the 15-pack special for all agency partners:
  • $299/year for 15 licenses - price locked in for 2 more years.
  • Price does not change until 2025 ($328.90/yr after).
  • Resell each license at $120/yr (+ a recommended $100-$200 setup fee)
  • Cover your cost with just three clients signing up (most agencies report 80% or more of new clients signing up with Termageddon when they sign the website policies waiver prior to site launch).
  • Free swag item from shop.termageddon.com

The 15pack is now available in your Termageddon account (under "Hello" -> "Billing" -> "Buy" -> "Buy in Bulk"). New orders/clients only; this deal can not be used for previous client license purchases.

PrestoPlayer support (WordPress)

Our plugin was updated yesterday to support some compatibility challenges with PrestoPlayer when videos are embedding under a particular set of settings. Simply put, our plugin provides now a 'prestoplayer support' toggle item that you can enable and will resolve this issue. Special shout out to our contract WP dev Dakotah for the help!

Texas likely to be next state to pass a privacy law

Something must be in the air because more and more states are getting their act together and setting up privacy protections for their residents! Over the next two weeks, Texas will likely sign it's privacy bill into law, making it the 4th state in the last 8 weeks to pass a privacy law. We've been monitoring this bill since its inception and are ready to publish the compliance guide once officially passed! Feel free to check out our Global Privacy Bill Tracker to see the bills we are actively monitoring.

FAQ for new cookie consent layout

1. How do I set up this new consent layout option?

Log in, click into your license, click 'edit policy details' for the "Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire".

On the first page, select the 'bottom left' layout option. Click 'next' several times and 'submit'. Your new cookie consent layout will be deployed within seconds! You can test in incognito mode to confirm.

2. Do I need to re-embed the cookie consent script if I make design changes?

No. You simply update your answers to the Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire and click 'submit'. Changes will take effect within a few seconds. Test in incognito to confirm.

If you choose to change from "Fingerprint icon" to "Privacy Settings Hyperlink", you will be provided with an additional script to paste into your global website footer.

3. What is the cost of this new feature?

No additional fee. Included in each license.

4. I don't see the option to create a cookie consent tool, how do I do that? Do I need a cookie consent solution for my website?

If you generated a Privacy Policy and you are not seeing the option to activate/generate the Cookie Policy and Consent Tool, then that means you answered the Privacy Policy questionnaire in a way that means you are not required to provide a consent solution.

Some, not all, privacy laws require a consent solution. Also, privacy laws are different and a GDPR consent mechanism is not the same as a CPRA opt-out mechanism, for example.

Page 1 of Termageddon's Privacy Policy questionnaire helps you identify the privacy laws that apply to you, and based on those answers, the respective consent mechanism will be generated for you. More information here on how to activate the cookie consent mechanism.

If you still would like to have a consent solution regardless, please reply to this email and we can activate it for you (please let us know if you want a GDPR/UK DPA and/or the CPRA/VCDPA layout).

5. How do I choose a layout option like the ones you showed in this email?

Page 1 of the Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire will ask you if you want to display categories or not. Page 3 of the questionnaire will ask you if you want to use the 'x' button or the 'continue without accepting' link. Choose your options based on the type of layout you want and click 'next' and ultimately 'submit'. Changes will take effect in seconds.Test in incognito to confirm you like the new design.

6. When can I use css to style the consent solution?

With this new consent layout option now deployed, we will work with Usercentrics to open up more design flexibility to all our partners to more easily control the look/feel of the consent layouts.

7. What about the new privacy laws?

The latest string of new privacy laws over the last couple of months indeed require a consent mechanism if those laws apply to you. Once the laws are in effect, our respective customers will automatically get the new layout deployed to those respective website visitors.
